title: 2nd Korea Logic Day
content:
In 2022 the Korea Logic Day was organized by KAIST SoC 2021 graduate Dr. Sewon Park (now Kyoto U) jointly with Joonhee Kim (Yonsei U) and Eunsuk Yang (Jeonbuk NU).
Invited by these organizers, the following nine speakers gave talks of 40 minutes each on various aspects of Logic:
Seungrak Choi (SNU), Hanul Jeon (Cornell U), Junguk Lee (KAIST), Dongwoo Kim (CUNY), Hyoyoon Lee (Yonsei U), Svetlana Selivanova (KAIST), Ki Yung Ahn (Hannam U), Holger Thies (Kyoto U), Eunsuk Yang (Jeonbuk NU).
http://korealogicday.org/2022
